page.title: 13MEDIA A CHARITY APPEAL
page.content: Since Mrs Wakley launched the appeal 10 days ago she has collected Â£150. "It is amazing how exceptionally kind people are. There are so many different appeals around at the moment, but most people have been only too willing to give something", she said.The appeal has no target but the equipment she wishes to buy costs around Â£3000 including a cardiac monitor. Everton Football club has given a signed autograph book which will be auctioned by a Radio City D.J. and Highfield Riding Club are holding a one day event on Sunday with part of the proceeds going to the fund raising appeal.Northop Playgroup is holding a bring and buy sale on June 28th and will donate its profits."I would like to go back to the hospital with a fat cheque" said Mrs Wakley.
